title: Broadway Flea Market + Grand Auction
description: W. 44th + 45 Sts., Shubert Alley, and the Times Square pedestrian plaza between 45th + 46th Sts.

title: Eighth Annual House of Yes Block Party + After Party
description: House of Yes (Bushwick).

title: Pasar Malam: Indonesian Food Bazaar
description: Culture Lab (LIC).

title: Free Outdoor Movies
description: Weather permitting: A Bug's Life at Robert Moses Playground (Murray Hill), Barbie at Hudson Yards Public Square + Gardens, The Little Mermaid (2023) at Irving Square Park (Bushwick).

title: Third Annual John Coltrane Festival
description: A packed lineup of musicians pay tribute to jazz great John Coltrane at Richard Rodgers Amphitheater in Marcus Garvey Park (Harlem).

title: Character Night
description: Discover new, unusual, and funny characters, impressions, and bits created by a lineup of imaginative performers. Hosted by Otter Lee (Tooning Out the News). Magnet Theater (Chelsea).

title: Stand-Up Comedy at New-York Historical Society
description: Comedian, tour guide, and NYC history nerd Tom Delgado hosts an early-bird hour of comedy with a Gotham spin at the New-York Historical Society Museum + Library (UWS).

title: Nerd Nite: 19th Season Kick-Off
description: Fun-yet-informative presentations on a wide range of subjects. Littlefield (Gowanus).

title: Kweendom
description: LGBTQ+ comedy and storytelling show, featuring performances by Tessa Skara, David Mills, Ricky Sim, Annabeth Mann, and Slim. Hosted by Bobby Hankinson. Pete’s Candy Store (Williamsburg).

title: Dreamland Roller Disco
description: Lola Star’s themed skate parties continue at Prospect Park’s Lefrak Center for the fall season. Tonight’s theme: 70s shimmer disco.

title: Best Night Ever: Comedy Music Party
description: Comedy, music, and party combine at Audrey Black and Akshay Sampath’s Best Night Ever. El Santo Taqueria (East Williamsburg / Bushwick).

title: ¡Vaya! Latin Band Dance Music Series: Orquesta Broadway
description: Cuban charanga band Orquesta Broadway returns to Lincoln Center’s David Rubenstein Atrium (UWS).

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: Women-produced and-hosted comedy show, returning to the back room at Halyards (Gowanus).

title: Cheap Therapy by Hoes with Feelings
description: Stand-up comedy meets group therapy. The Living Room at Arlo Soho.

title: The National Arts Club Community Day
description: The National Arts Club (Gramercy).

title: 34th Annual West 104th Street Block Association Yard Sale
description: West 104th St bet. West End Ave + Riverside Drive.

title: Astoria Park Alliance’s Third Annual Classic Car Show
description: Shore Boulevard along Astoria Park.

title: La Feria: Print Media Fair
description: 20 Cooper Square, 3rd Floor (Noho/East Village).

title: New York Queer Zine Fair
description: The Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual + Transgender Community Center (Greenwich Village).

title: Annual Brooklyn Flea Record Fair
description: Marsha P. Johnson State Park (Williamsburg), next to Smorgasburg.

title: 67th Annual German-American Steuben Parade
description: Fifth Avenue from 68th Street to 86th Street.

title: 13th Annual All About Downtown Street Fair
description: Newark Ave bet. Grove St. + Coles St. (Jersey City).

title: Poseidon’s Parade
description: Boardwalk at Beach 105th St. to 95th St. (Rockaway Beach).

title: Jersey City Night Market
description: Journal Square-Magnolia Landing.

title: Art Crawl Journal Square
description: (Jersey City).

description: Morningside Heights.

title: Sneaker Con

title: Oktoberfest Celebrations
description: Throughout NYC.

description: Various locations.
